subject: Basketball (College)
Basketball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Johnson, one of several players from Kentucky in this year’s draft, has been training for years in an unlikely location: the Pratt Institute, a prestigious art school.
